short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limits your YouTube usage by annoying you after being on YouTube for longer than 10 minutes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you struggle to get your work done spending time on YouTube "YouLimit" is the right tool for you. It will show an overlay reminding you to be productive every 10 minutes you spend on YouTube. You then can pick either to close YouTube or to continue wasting time.
